attributes.action: campaign to re-open Mallards Tea Shop in Knutsford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This erstwhile local employer and purveyor of fine teas stands folornly empty having closed.  Surely there must be a way of re-opening this shop and bringing a fillip to the local economy?

rejection.details: This petition does not comment on government policy. The PM cannot campaign on any person or organisation's behalf.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
